name: Murakumo: Renegade Mech Pursuit
description:
Murakumo: Renegade Mech Pursuit is an action game. It was originally released in 2003. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Murakumo: Renegade Mech Pursuit on Xbox.
Akinori Kaneko produced the game. It was directed by Masanori Takeuchi.
